definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
a blade will get rusty if it is not sharpened; a man will fall behind if he doesn't study (idiom)
pinyin: dao1 bu4 mo2 yao4 sheng1 xiu4 , ren2 bu4 xue2 yao4 luo4 hou4
containing_words.word: 刀不磨要生锈，人不学要落后

definition: a "screw that never rusts" — sb who selflessly and wholeheartedly serves the Communist Party, like Lei Feng 雷鋒|雷锋[Lei2 Feng1], to whom the metaphor is attributed
pinyin: yong3 bu4 sheng1 xiu4 de5 luo2 si1 ding1

sentences.english: These substances leak from the rusty barrels and pollute soil.
sentences.chinese: 这些物质从生锈的桶中渗出然后污染了土壤。

sentences.english: A man, like a sword, rusts in idleness.
sentences.chinese: 刀不用会生锈，人闲着会怠惰。

sentences.english: Here's a close up of these chokes, notice the bubbles.
sentences.chinese: 这有些生锈电感的近照，注意那些气泡。

sentences.english: eg: But regular cleaning will keep the metal from rusting.
sentences.chinese: 但定期的清洁能使金属免于生锈。
露在外面的铁会生锈的。

sentences.english: Qualified Alu Stand, not get rusty and longer using-life.
sentences.chinese: 优质铝合金支架，永不生锈，寿命更长。

sentences.english: "It would be better for it to be running, " they said, "than sitting up rusting."
sentences.chinese: 用着总比放着生锈来的强“朋友说道。

sentences.english: Remember the previous pictures of the old and rotten vessel which is out-of-date?
sentences.chinese: 还记得前面那艘过时的老掉牙的生锈的船吗？

sentences.english: The technique of comprehensive cocooning can keep the cocooned from rusting for 2-5 years.
sentences.chinese: 综合封存技术可以保证被封存件2～5年不生锈。

sentences.english: He shook his head, shouldered the rusty firelock .
sentences.chinese: 他摇了摇头，掮上那支生锈的火枪。

sentences.english: Like rustiness, idleness consume more body energies than work.
sentences.chinese: 懒惰像生锈一样，比操劳更能消耗身体。

sentences.english: Do not grind knives to rust, water does not flow to stink.
sentences.chinese: 刀不磨要生锈，水不流要发臭。

sentences.english: If the drill pipe threads become rusty, rust will have to be cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 如果钻杆丝扣生锈，必须清除掉。
正义是不会生锈的金属。

sentences.english: Overshot parts are usually covered with grease lest they should rust.
sentences.chinese: 卡瓦打捞筒配件通常都涂润滑油，以防生锈。

definition: to peel off (paint)/(fig.) to be exposed/to lose face (Tw)
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
to age (of person or object)/becoming old
made of steel/steel (bar, screw, product etc)
